to_address:
Steve Langasek <vorlon@debian.org>,
   Volker Lendecke <Volker.Lendecke@SerNet.DE>, samba-technical@samba.org,
   pkg-samba-maint@lists.alioth.debian.org, jgoerzen@debian.org,
   wichert@wiggy.net
subject:
Re: [Fwd: DO NOT REPLY [Bug 4600] New: make python_ext fails for
 3.0.25rc3]
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Steve,

> I've cc:ed the Debian developers who originally 
> requested that we ship these bindings; perhaps one of them still
> has a use for those bindings and would be willing to maintain
> them upstream.  If not, I have no objections to
> dropping them, though it would be helpful to us if 
> dropping them was done post-3.0.25.

Thanks for the patch for 3.0.25.  If the extensions are to be
dropped, it would have to be in 3.0.26.





cheers, jerry
